body_html:
Hey @klappradla, Looks like you were correct 😬. Grammarly and Firefox was a bad combination. I couldn't reproduce the bug once I disabled Grammarly. I tried to reproduce the bug on Google Chrome(I have Grammarly installed there too), couldn't reproduce it there.
Anyway, thanks to both of you.🙂 I'll close this issue then.

body:
Hey @klappradla, Looks like you were correct 😬. Grammarly and Firefox was a bad combination. I couldn't reproduce the bug once I disabled Grammarly. I tried to reproduce the bug on Google Chrome(I have Grammarly installed there too), couldn't reproduce it there.
Anyway, thanks to both of you.🙂 I'll close this issue then.
